plot: A teenage girl shoots her father after years of sexual and physical abuse. Her attorney, who can relate to her situation, fights to save her from a life sentence in prison.
title: Guilty Innocence
plot_es: A teenage girl shoots her father after years of sexual and physical abuse. Her attorney, who can relate to her situation, fights to save her from a life sentence in prison.
plot_en: A teenage girl shoots her father after years of sexual and physical abuse. Her attorney, who can relate to her situation, fights to save her from a life sentence in prison.
